text: Dileep Kamble (born 1 June 1963) is a leader of Bharatiya Janata Party and was a member of 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly from Pune Cantonment. .http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/home/specials/assembly- elections-2014/maharashtra-news/No-gain-for-imported-candidates-in- Pune/articleshow/44914075.cms Currently he lost his Ministry of State for Social Justice and Special Assistance due to his unsuccessful efforts in Devendra Fadnavis ministry (2014–2019).http://www.sarkaritel.com/states/council_of_ministers.php?state=MHhttp://www.mid- day.com/articles/declared-portfolios-of-maharashtra-government- ministers/15821176 ==Political career== ===Positions held=== ====Within BJP==== ====Legislative==== * Member Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Since October 2014 ==References== Category:Politicians from Pune Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Marathi politicians
title: Dilip Kamble
